title: The Hollywood Revue of 1929
brief_description: Hosted by Conrad Nagel and Jack Benny this film features many of the MGM contracted stars and performers in an all-out musical comedy revue staged in Hollywood in 1929. Includes such luminaries as Joan Crawford, Laurel and Hardy, John Gilbert, Norma Shearer, Buster Keaton, and Marie Dressler.
